017package org.microbean.qualifier;
018
019import java.lang.constant.Constable;
020import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
021import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
023import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
024
025import java.util.Objects;
026import java.util.Optional;
027
028import org.microbean.development.annotation.Experimental;
029import org.microbean.development.annotation.OverridingEncouraged;
030
031import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
032import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Object;
033import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.DEFAULT_NAME;
034import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.NULL;
035import static java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.STATIC;
036
037import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_QualifiedRecord;
038import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Qualifiers;
039
040/**
041 * A {@link Constable} pairing of a {@link Qualifiers} and an {@link
042 * Object} that is qualified by them.
043 *
044 * @param <K> the type borne by the keys of the {@link Qualifiers} in
045 * this {@link Qualified}
046 *
047 * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the {@link Qualifiers}
048 * in this {@link Qualified}
049 *
050 * @param <T> the type of the object that is qualified; note that if it
051 * does not extend {@link Constable} then a {@link Qualified} bearing
052 * it will return an {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty
053 * <code>Optional</code>} from its {@link #describeConstable()} method
054 *
055 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
056 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
057 *
058 * @see Qualifiers
059 *
060 * @see Constable
061 */
062@Experimental
063public interface Qualified<K extends Comparable<? super K>, V, T> extends Constable {
064
065
066  /*
067   * Instance methods.
068   */
069
070
071  /**
072   * Returns the {@link Qualifiers} that qualifies this {@link
073   * Qualified}.
074   *
075   * @return the {@link Qualifiers} that qualifies this {@link
076   * Qualified}; never {@code null}
077   *
078   * @nullability Implementations of this method must not return
079   * {@code null}.
080   *
081   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
082   * and deterministic.
083   *
084   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
085   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
086   */
087  public Qualifiers<K, V> qualifiers();
088
089  /**
090   * Returns the qualified thing this {@link Qualified} represents.
091   *
092   * @return the qualified thing this {@link Qualified} represents;
093   * possibly, but not normally, {@code null}
094   *
095   * @nullability Implementations of this method may return {@code
096   * null}.
097   *
098   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
099   * and deterministic.
100   *
101   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
102   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
103   */
104  public T qualified();
105
106  /**
107   * Returns an {@link Optional} containing the nominal descriptor for
108   * this instance, if one can be constructed, <strong>or an
109   * {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty} {@link Optional} if one
110   * cannot be constructed</strong>.
111   *
112   * <p>The default implementation of this method returns an {@link
113   * Optional Optional&lt;? extends ConstantDesc&gt;} that is computed
114   * from only the return value of the {@link #qualifiers()} method
115   * and the return value of the {@link #qualified()} method.  This
116   * may or may not be sufficient for any given subclass'
117   * semantics.</p>
118   *
119   * @return an {@link Optional} containing the nominal descriptor for
120   * this instance, if one can be constructed, <strong>or an
121   * {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty} {@link Optional} if one
122   * cannot be constructed</strong>; never {@code null}
123   *
124   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
125   * return {@code null}.
126   *
127   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
128   * idempotent and deterministic.
129   *
130   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
131   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
132   */
133  @Override // Constable
134  @OverridingEncouraged
135  public default Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
136    final ConstantDesc qualifiersDesc = this.qualifiers().describeConstable().orElse(null);
137    if (qualifiersDesc != null) {
138      final Object qualified = this.qualified();
139      final ConstantDesc qualifiedDesc;
140      if (qualified == null) {
141        qualifiedDesc = NULL;
142      } else if (qualified instanceof Constable cq) {
143        qualifiedDesc = cq.describeConstable().orElse(null);
144      } else if (qualified instanceof ConstantDesc cd) {
145        qualifiedDesc = cd;
146      } else {
147        qualifiedDesc = null;
148      }
149      if (qualifiedDesc != null) {
150        return
151          Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.ofNamed(BSM_INVOKE,
152                                                  DEFAULT_NAME,
153                                                  CD_QualifiedRecord,
154                                                  MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(CD_QualifiedRecord,
155                                                                                 CD_Qualifiers,
156                                                                                 CD_Object),
157                                                  qualifiersDesc,
158                                                  qualifiedDesc));
159      }
160    }
161    return Optional.empty();
162  }
163
164
165  /*
166   * Inner and nested classes.
167   */
168
169
170  /**
171   * A {@link Qualified} {@link java.lang.Record}.
172   *
173   * @param <K> the type borne by the keys of the {@link Qualifiers} in
174   * this {@link Qualified.Record}
175   *
176   * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the {@link Qualifiers}
177   * in this {@link Qualified.Record}
178   *
179   * @param <T> the type of the object that is qualified; note that if
180   * it does not extend {@link Constable} then a {@link Record}
181   * bearing it will return an {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty
182   * <code>Optional</code>} from its {@link #describeConstable()}
183   * method
184   *
185   * @param qualifiers the {@link Qualifiers}; may be {@code null} in
186   * which case the return value of {@link Qualifiers#of()} will be
187   * used instead
188   *
189   * @param qualified the object being qualified; may be {@code null}
190   *
191   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
192   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
193   */
194  public static final record Record<K extends Comparable<? super K>, V, T>(Qualifiers<K, V> qualifiers,
195                                                                           T qualified)
196    implements Qualified<K, V, T> {
197
198
199    /*
200     * Canonical constructor.
201     */
202
203
204    /**
205     * Creates a new {@link Record}.
206     *
207     * @param qualifiers the {@link Qualifiers}; may be {@code null}
208     * in which case the return value of {@link Qualifiers#of()} will
209     * be used instead
210     *
211     * @param qualified the object being qualified; may be {@code
212     * null}
213     */
214    public Record {
215      if (qualifiers == null) {
216        qualifiers = Qualifiers.of();
217      }
218    }
219
220  }
221
222}
